about_me.body: I'm a self-taught young freelance web / app designer and also developer from Czech Republic. I've been doing stuff around web for nearly 3 years now.

what_i_do.title: What I do? ðŸ’­
what_i_do.body: From web designing in Figma, because I have passion in UI & UX design, through reworking the design into custom Wordpress design to working around with Shopify and it's themes. I also really love React, which this entire website is written in, and it's whole ecosystem (NextJS, etc.). You can see below, what I've tried and liked or what I'm working with.
